fields.description:
To reproduce:
1. Install and run KS> Controls> Picker> Picker Single column2

Actual result:
Crash
{code}
Jun 28 11:58:38 Europa ReportCrash[341] <Notice>: ReportCrash acting against PID 339
Jun 28 11:58:38 Europa ReportCrash[341] <Notice>: Formulating crash report for process KitchenSink[339]
Jun 28 11:58:38 Europa ReportCrash[341] <Error>: libMobileGestalt MobileGestalt.c:240: string Carrier is not a valid gestalt question
{code}
fields.summary: iOS7: Picker - Picker Singe column 2 - crash on launch
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.1.201306131423
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.1GA
iPhone 5 iOS 7.0
Xcode5
CLI 3.1.1
KitchenSink Version 3.1.1.GA
